solution_line_template: Jerry will spend {games_per_daughter} games x {game_duration_hours} hours per game = <<{games_per_daughter}*{game_duration_hours}={hours_one_daughter_games}>>{hours_one_daughter_games} hours watching one daughter play her games.

He will spend {hours_one_daughter_games} x {num_daughters} = <<{hours_one_daughter_games}*{num_daughters}={hours_both_daughters_games}>>{hours_both_daughters_games} hours watching both daughters play their games.

He will spend {games_per_daughter} games x {practice_hours_per_game} hours of practice = <<{games_per_daughter}*{practice_hours_per_game}={hours_one_daughter_practice}>>{hours_one_daughter_practice} hours watching one daughter practice.

He will spend {hours_one_daughter_practice} x {num_daughters} = <<{hours_one_daughter_practice}*{num_daughters}={hours_both_daughters_practice}>>{hours_both_daughters_practice} hours watching both daughters practice.

He will spend a total of {hours_both_daughters_games} hours watching games + {hours_both_daughters_practice} hours watching practice = <<{hours_both_daughters_games}+{hours_both_daughters_practice}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.
